description: A class to describe an item of trade. It includes a generic description applicable to all examples of the item together with optional subsidiary descriptions of any number of actual instances of the type.

Name.title: Item. Name
Name.description: A short name given to this item, such as a name from a catalogue.

ManufactureDate.title: Item Instance. Manufacture Date. Date
ManufactureDate.description: The date on which this item instance was manufactured.
